tool_description: send mail to anyone anonmyously. Only receiver's mail is required
name: anonmyous mail sender
title: anonmyous mail sender

api_list.name: send an anonymous email
api_list.description: this endpoint sends an anonymous email to the provided email address
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://anonmyous-mail-sender.p.rapidapi.com/send"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anonmyous-mail-sender.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://anonmyous-mail-sender.p.rapidapi.com/send"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anonmyous-mail-sender.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
